Bir Puzzle oyunu düşünün hiç sıkmayan ve oynarken farklı objeler ve yöntemlerle tanıştıran "Ne oyun yapmışlar be!" diyebileceğiniz bir efsane. Oyun kısa olsa da yoğun puzzle hissiyatı ile size istediğinizi yeteri kadar veriyo. İndirimde bundle'ını düşünmeden alın derim.

Hab das Spiel in knapp 2 Stunden das erste Mal durchgespielt. Das war mit Sicherheit nicht das letzte Mal, Zusatzinhalte gibts ja auch noch.
Aber JUNGE JUNGE Ich hab selten so lachen können. Die KI ist auf eine bestimmte Art so sympathisch, dass das allein schon zum erneuten Spielen motiviert. Wunderbares Spiel mit gewissem Knobelfaktor.

n年后的补档，从新玩了一次后发现貌似卡bug到结局蛋糕房间的方法好像不行了，而且健忘的我愣是想起了以前的通关过程导致没有卡过一关233

This game is absolutely fantastic...

im not usually one to leave reviews, but after beating this game i feel compelled to. This game roped me in with the challenging puzzles that feel so rewarding after you comlete them. I beat this game in 1 sitting (3 hours) because i just became addicted. The humor is very clever and dark, and the gameplay is suberb. The graphics still look amazing even though this game is almost a decade old, and the atmosphere is encapsulating. The voice acting is spot on. The game wont hesitate to kick you in the butt with its difficulty, but even if you get stumped and frustrated, you will find a way.

Gameplay - 10/10
story - 9/10
Atmosphere - 9/10
Graphics - 9/10

Overall, if you can pick up this game for any price of about $5 or lower it is 100% worth it. I bought the portal double pack in the summer sale for $2.50 (includes portal 1 and 2) and that was a steal. after playing i can see why people consider this game a timeless classic in pc gaming history.
Muy buen juego, buena historia, buena  jugabilidad, buena optimizacion, excelente juego. 100% recomendado

Era da moltissimo tempo che volevo provarlo ma non ne ho mai avuto l'occasione, ho sfruttato gli sconti prendendolo in bundle con il suo successore al prezzo stracciato di 2,43€. Super affare, li vale tutti. La storia purtroppo è abbastanza breve, la difficoltà è ben calibrata, né troppo facile né troppo difficile, in alcuni punti ci sono degli enigmi interessanti. La sfida diventa decisamente più ardua con le camere avanzate e soprattutto con la modalità che ti impone di finire gli enigmi limitando l'utilizzo dei portali dei passi o del tempo. Consigliato.

Пожалуй, один из лучших шедевров от VALVE. Нам предстоит пройти ряд головоломок эксперимента, и выбратся живым. Покупал по скидке 1 и 2 часть в комплекте, и не пожалел потраченных денег на игру. Хорошая возможность убить время разгадывая как пройти ту или иную комнату испытаний (можно с друзьями даже неплохо убить время за пивком).
I play Portal 2 first, then this one. If you love puzzle type of game, then this is for you. Got nothing more to say, this game is frigging good! but the 2nd one is better.

剧情太短了啊  两个小时就通关了

以前就关注过这个系列，趁这次夏季特惠入的手，用了5个多小时通的关，感觉一直在和机器人们斗智斗勇。从第十八关开始难度骤增，试了好久都没过去，最后实在没办法了才去找了攻略，结果又尝试了半天才过去，之后很顺利的打到了结尾，剧情也就戛然而止。总的来说，游戏的玩法很有创意，需要玩家注意游戏中的一些细节，很多关都需要借助方块才过的去，有些关卡真的需要灵光一闪才行。缺点是由于一些传送门的设置会有翻转，连续玩的多了会有眩晕感，时间长了可能会感到头痛。总而言之，这款游戏值得一玩。

Portal has just about reached its 10 year anniversary, and it is still a fantastic game to play! It is a must-have for any game collection, and you may as well buy it while it's only a dollar. The gameplay is fun and innovative for its time (and it still holds up), the story is simple yet solid, and the game made me laugh, get angry, and nearly cry, all in a quick, one day game. If there is anything bad to say about this game, it would definitely be the playtime; I was able to finish the game in a single day, and the first half of the test chambers felt like tutorials. All in all, I would highly reccomend this game.

Portal is a solid game. It's very short (generally completed in about 4 hours), but it's fun. The gameplay is solid and holds up to the test of time, but GLaDOS is really what makes the game fun. It makes the game 100x better to have a sassy emotionless robot yelling at you the entire time. 


I would like to note that I bought the game during the Summer Sale, so it was 99 cents and not the usual $9.99 sticker price. I wouldn't recommend buying it for $9.99 unless you like to play through games again.

А если вы хотите пощекотать свои нервы, то добро пожаловать!

Played for the first time on a friend's computer in 2010. Played through the main story in one sitting because I wanted to know what the next puzzle would be. Bought it again because I noticed Portal 2 was on sale and asked my friend if I should play it and he told me "F*****g yes oh my gosh get it right now." I then decided I would get this game to brush up as I haven't been thinking with portals for years. Loved it even more the second time through. Had me scratching my head from time to time though the game did make me a little nauseous from time to time. Looking forwarding to playing the second and through this again, hopefully before 2024!
